name: HerveCaumont.github.io
body:
### Digital earth scalers

Our world is changing fast
We support Earth Sciences at many scales

Benefit from cutting-edge tools to operate within distributed computing environments
So you run end-to-end analysis
as a simple, flexible, scalable process

Experience with services from a high-performing, DevOps-enabled organization,
and get increased agility and reliability
Combine data sources across disciplines, validate innovative ways to process them

Integrate data and literature, document your experiments, share across communities
We build upon the new data streams economy
Together we connect research to value-adding services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
